## scatterplot


```{r scatterplot}
summary(cars)

mpg

g <- ggplot(data = mpg, aes(x=displ, y=hwy))

g + geom_point()
```
### I need colour

```{r colour}
g <- ggplot(data = mpg, aes(x=displ, y=hwy, color = class))+ 
  geom_point()
g
```

## bw figure
```{r bw}
g <- ggplot(data = mpg, aes(x=displ, y=hwy, shape = class))+ 
  geom_point()
g
```

## size figure
```{r size}
g <- ggplot(data = mpg, aes(x=displ, y=hwy, size = class))+ 
  geom_point()
g
```

## fix colour figure
```{r fix colour}
g <- ggplot(data = mpg, aes(x=displ, y=hwy, size = class))+ 
  geom_point(alpha = 0.2, color = "blue")
g
```

## exercise figure
```{r exercise}
ggplot(data = mpg, aes(x=displ, y=hwy, color = cty))+ geom_point()
g
```
### violin
```{r geom_examples}
ggplot(data=mpg, aes(x=drv, y=hwy)) +
  geom_violin()
```
###multi
```{r geom_multi}
ggplot(data=mpg)+
  geom_point(aes(x=displ,y=hwy))+
  geom_smooth(aes(x=displ, y=hwy))
```
### customize 
```{r custom}
ggplot(data=mpg, aes(x=displ,y=hwy))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth()+
  labs(title = "relationship b/w engine size and MPG", x= "Highway MPG", y="Engine displacement")+
  theme_bw()+
  theme(text = element_text(size = 16))
